## Who am I?

I'm Davis, a Software Engineer at [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/) working on creating user friendly R packages with the rest of the [tidyverse](https://github.com/tidyverse) team.

## What else?

I've developed a few R packages:

-   [furrr](https://furrr.futureverse.org)
-   [slider](https://davisvaughan.github.io/slider)
-   [clock](https://clock.r-lib.org)
-   [almanac](https://davisvaughan.github.io/almanac)
-   [hardhat](http://hardhat.tidymodels.org)
-   [workflows](http://workflows.tidymodels.org)
-   [probably](https://probably.tidymodels.org)

And I work on many more, including:

-   [tidyr](https://tidyr.tidyverse.org)
-   [vctrs](https://vctrs.r-lib.org)
-   [yardstick](https://yardstick.tidymodels.org)
